sentence: Asked last year by the website Ballotpedia which representatives he wanted to model himself after, Bell named white-nationalist-linked Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and conspiracy theorist Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH).
author: Josh Israel
title: Anti-Semitic, Homophobic Conspiracist Challenging Rep. Luria In Virginia

sentence: But only a few days later, during a segment with Rep. Jim Jordan, Tucker voiced the same sentiment more clearly: “I think we should probably take the side of Russia,” he said, “if we have to choose between Russia and Ukraine.” Despite saying that he was "just kidding" about rooting for Russia over Ukraine, Tucker just doubled down on supporting the Russians in the conflict.
author: Tim Dickinson
title: These Are the American Right-Wingers Covering for Putin as Russia Invades Ukraine

sentence: PSYOP.” The communications between Meadows and Thomas disclosed her anger that so few Republicans were rallying behind Trump in the way that Representatives Louie Gohmert, Jim Jordan, Paul Gosar, and Chip Roy were.
author: Peter Wehner
title: A Glimpse Into a Fearful, Angry, Imaginary World
